sub_title: Associate Professor at Radboud University. Biology - Research - Teaching.
summary:
Animal physiologist. My current research activities in the Department of Animal Ecology & Physiology are in fish physiology, and focus on the thyroid gland and thyroid hormones. Aquaculture, aquatic toxicology, and human disease models are important research contexts.

I do quite a bit of teaching in our university. Physiology, endocrinology, but also two statistics courses for our (medical) biology (under)graduates. I aim to deliver courses to my students that provide insight in how knowledge is obtained by discussing experimental approaches, not just data only. Lectures should not only convey information, but also serve to titillate the students’ scientific palate.

profile_positions.description:
Department of Animal Ecology and Physiology, Radboud Institute for Biological and Environmental Sciences (RIBES)

- Research interests: adaptation physiology in fishes, thyroid hormones.
- Teaching and coordinating (past and current) bachelor/master courses in Endocrinology, Zoology, Animal Physiology, Integrative Physiology, Advanced Adaptation Physiology, Advanced Endocrinology, Statistics 101 and 201, Introduction to Education (multidisciplinary bachelor), and the Huygens' lecture series on Evolution (multidisciplinary bachelor).
profile_positions.title: Assistant Professor

profile_positions.description: The Royal Dutch Zoological Society was founded in 1872 with the aim to "promote zoological research in the widest sense."
profile_positions.title: Board member/Secretary

profile_positions.description: The Journal-Based Learning program allows subscribers to undertake educational activities on selected articles published in the Journal of Endocrinology. The primary audience for these activities is clinicians-in-training and early career scientists working in endocrinology and in all endocrine-related disciplines. The activities will also be of interest to any clinician, scientist, researcher and/or other healthcare professional working in endocrinology or in any of its related disciplines.
profile_positions.title: Education Editor - Journal of Endocrinology
Senior Editor - Journal of Endocrinology & Journal of Molecular Endocrinology

profile_positions.description:
Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, Department of Veterinary Anatomy and Physiology (Division of Physiology).

- Investigating thyroid hormone uptake and metabolism in cardiac and skeletal muscle.
- Teaching and coordinating a multidisciplinary course on the anatomy, physiology, and biochemistry of the digestive system in production and farm animals for first-year veterinary medicine students.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant Professor

profile_positions.description: Department of Biomedical Science, investigating gastrointestinal transport physiology in cystic fibrosis.
